name: Hidden Object: Mysterious Wicked House
description:
Have guts to solve mystery solving puzzles? Yes! Then you are at right place. Find the hidden objects and be a detective. This games are also called as games for detective. Detectives always play mystery solving games and implement in their real life

You have given hidden scenes where you should find girls gadgets, car acceceries, football, barbie doll, fighting instruments, cooking appliancec, math symbols, and many more unique objects to find!
